{"title": "Reminder: You have items in your cart", 
"content": "Dear valued customer,

We noticed that you have items saved in your shopping cart, but they haven't been checked out yet. We just wanted to remind you of the items you have saved and the great deals that are waiting for you.

If you need any assistance with completing your purchase, please don't hesitate to contact our friendly customer service team.

Thank you for choosing our store and we hope to hear from you soon.

Best regards,
The team at [company name]",
"buttonText": "View your cart",
"buttonUrl": "https://www.example.com/cart",
"imageUrls": ["https://picsum.photos/id/1/200/300", "https://picsum.photos/id/2/200/300", "https://picsum.photos/id/3/200/300"],
"category": "AbandonedCart"}
